explanation: [0-0] In a room, a man wearing a gray top is sitting at a beige table. On the table are three brightly colored ties with different patterns, from left to right: a colorful star pattern, a colorful circle pattern, and a colorful flower pattern. A woman with long hair, wearing a yellow top and a scrunchie, is standing with her back to him. Behind them is a staircase with white railings. There is a plant with red flowers on the left and white curtains hanging on the right.

[0-8] The woman turns to the right, holding a red and black brick-like object in her right hand and a bag of chips in her left hand. She is wearing the tie with the colorful star pattern on her face. The man shakes his hands, then picks up the tie with the colorful star pattern from the table, opens his mouth in surprise, and puts the tie around his neck. The woman then hands the chips in her left hand to the man, who happily holds the chips up.
